data.title: Start Round Default Dart for Top Belt
data.description: This lineup is not specific, you simply shoot the arrow in the general area to gain early round information on any Defenders looking to take an aggressive engagement.

data.title: B Green to B Site Shock Bolt
data.description: This is a good set of shock darts for post plant on B Site.

data.title: Early Round Mid Blue To B Orange Recon Bolt
data.description: This is useful for quickly scanning players in B Orange at the beginning of the round.

data.title: A Nest to A Site Shock Dart
data.description: This is a good shock dart combo to kill enemies on the boxes on A Site.

data.title: A Belt to A Site Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a good recon bolt to spot a lot of angles on A Site.

data.title: Mid Blue to Mid Boiler Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a good recon bolt to see enemies in Mid Boiler.

data.title: Early A Site And A Nest Recon Bolt
data.description: This recon bolt is a great way to get some early information as to where the defending side players are set up on A Site.
